TEXT: Out of the corner of your eye, you see a strange purple #pgap. A compulsion urges you to @look@ @away,@ to continue your ascent, but the tantalizing rift beckons you, promising #gfreedom.
Venture into the wondrous land of illusions.
Fight a special elite enemy to obtain the last Occult Ball.

Urban Legends to add to your hand.

The denizens of this land are #pstrange, often #pdisconcerting at times. But their chaotic antics are a #gbreath of fresh air, a welcome reprieve from the stagnant spire that you could no longer remember.
Continue your adventure in the land of illusions.
